short_summary: The Department of National Defence, 3 CDSB Det Wainwright, Renwds portable shower trailers and services for expected contract duration of 5 years.
description: The department has the requirement for the rental of portable shower trailers, and the removal of grey and/or black water from temporary holding containers on an "as and when required" basis. The portable shower trailers and associated services are for the Department of National Defence, 3 CDSB Det Wainwright, located in Denwood, Alberta. All permanent facilities located within the base are excluded from this request for Standing Offer.
full_summary:
### Government Notice to Tender: Shower Trailer Rentals
#### Reference Number
WS3927297021

#### Solicitation Number
WS3927297021

#### Amendment Number
3

#### Publication Date
Thursday, May 30, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date and Time
Tuesday, June 30, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. eastern daylight time

#### Amendment Date
Thursday, June 23, 2023

#### Expected Contract Start Date
Monday, June 1, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date
Friday, May 31, 2028

#### Notice Type
Standing Offer

#### Description of Requirement
The Department of National Defence requires the rental of portable shower trailers for the removal of grey and/or black water from temporary holding containers at 3 CDSB Det Wainwright (DSGNWSRS CWO 3 CAD) in Denwood, Alberta.

#### Support Information
* [contractingEntityName-nomEntitContractante-eng] Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* [contactInfoName-informationsContactNom] Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC) at lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Supplies and Services Considered
Plumbing fixtures *30180000

#### Trade Agreements
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

Please note amendments to closing time for bid submittal, disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required bidding documentation and bid submission must be submitted by Tuesday, June 30, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. eastern daylight time. All
